name: magnesium lactate
content: Magnesium lactate, the magnesium salt of lactic acid.   == Mineral supplement == Magnesium lactate can be used as a mineral supplement to prevent and treat low amounts of magnesium in the blood. Magnesium lactate may help treat leg muscle cramps in pregnancy.   == Food additive == As a food additive, it has the E number E329 and is used in food and beverages as an acidity regulator.   == References ==
